name: Inventory
description: Base interface for anything that contains items.
overview: Inventory is the superinterface of all inventories in the game. It provides methods to query and modify the contents of the inventory.

methods.name: builder
methods.description: Creates a new Inventory Builder.

methods.name: poll
methods.description: Removes and returns the first item in the inventory.

methods.name: poll
methods.description: Removes and returns the first item in the inventory, up to the limit.

methods.name: pop
methods.description: Removes and returns the last item in the inventory.

methods.name: peek
methods.description: Returns the first item in the inventory without removing it.

methods.name: offer
methods.description: Adds the item to the inventory. Returns the items that were rejected.

methods.name: canFit
methods.description: Checks if the item can fit in the inventory.

methods.name: capacity
methods.description: The maximum number of slots in this inventory.

methods.name: size
methods.description: The number of slots in this inventory.

methods.name: totalItems
methods.description: The total number of items in this inventory.

methods.name: contains
methods.description: Checks if the inventory contains the specified item.

methods.name: contains
methods.description: Checks if the inventory contains the specified item type.

methods.name: containsAny
methods.description: Checks if the inventory contains any of the specified items.

methods.name: getMaxStackSize
methods.description: The maximum stack size for items in this inventory.

methods.name: setMaxStackSize
methods.description: Sets the maximum stack size for items in this inventory.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears the inventory.

methods.name: query
methods.description: Query this inventory for inventories matching the query.

methods.name: query
methods.description: Query this inventory using the operation.

methods.name: intersect
methods.description: Returns the intersection of this inventory and the specified inventory.

methods.name: union
methods.description: Returns the union of this inventory and the specified inventory.

methods.name: containsInventory
methods.description: Checks if the inventory contains the specified inventory.

methods.name: parent
methods.description: Returns the parent inventory, or this inventory if it has no parent.

methods.name: root
methods.description: Returns the root inventory.

methods.name: children
methods.description: Returns the children of this inventory.

methods.name: slots
methods.description: Returns the slots in this inventory.

methods.name: hasChildren
methods.description: Checks if this inventory has children.
